2450{
2451 // Can't use item_stack::only_item() since there might be fertilizer
2452 map_stack items = g->m.i_at( examp );
2453 const map_stack::iterator seed = std::find_if( items.begin(), items.end(), []( const item & it ) {
2454 return it.is_seed();
2455 } );
2456
2457 if( seed == items.end() ) {
2458 debugmsg( "Missing seed for plant at (%d, %d, %d)", examp.x, examp.y, examp.z );
2459 g->m.i_clear( examp );
2460 g->m.furn_set( examp, f_null );
2461 return;
2462 }
2463
2464 const std::string pname = seed->get_plant_name();
2465
2466 if( g->m.has_flag_furn( flag_GROWTH_HARVEST, examp ) &&
2467 query_yn( _( "Harvest the %s?" ), pname ) ) {
2468 harvest_plant( p, examp );
2469 } else if( !g->m.has_flag_furn( flag_GROWTH_HARVEST, examp ) ) {
2470 if( g->m.i_at( examp ).size() > 1 ) {
2471 add_msg( m_info, _( "This %s has already been fertilized." ), pname );
2472 return;
2473 }
2474 itype_id fertilizer = choose_fertilizer( p, pname, true /*ask player for confirmation */ );
2475
2476 if( !fertilizer.is_empty() ) {
2477 fertilize_plant( p, examp, fertilizer );
2478 }
2479 }
2480}

2614{
2615 furn_id cur_arcfurnace_type = g->m.furn( examp );
2616 furn_id next_arcfurnace_type = f_null;
2617 if( cur_arcfurnace_type == f_arcfurnace_empty ) {
2618 next_arcfurnace_type = f_arcfurnace_full;
2619 } else {
2620 debugmsg( "Examined furniture has action arcfurnace_empty, but is of type %s",
2621 g->m.furn( examp ).id().c_str() );
2622 return;
2623 }
2624
2625 static const std::set<material_id> arcfurnaceable{ material_id( "cac2powder" ) };
2626 bool fuel_present = false;
2627 auto items = g->m.i_at( examp );
2628 for( const item &i : items ) {
2629 if( i.typeId() == itype_chem_carbide ) {
2630 add_msg( _( "This furnace already contains calcium carbide." ) );
2631 add_msg( _( "Remove it before activating the arc furnace again." ) );
2632 return;
2633 } else if( i.made_of_any( arcfurnaceable ) ) {
2634 fuel_present = true;
2635 } else {
2636 add_msg( m_bad, _( "This furnace contains %s, which can't be made into calcium carbide!" ),
2637 i.tname( 1, false ) );
2638 return;
2639 }
2640 }
2641
2642 if( !fuel_present ) {
2643 add_msg( _( "This furance is empty. Fill it with powdered coke and lime mix, and try again." ) );
2644 return;
2645 }
2646
2647 ///\EFFECT_FABRICATION decreases loss when firing a furnace
2648 const int skill = p.get_skill_level( skill_fabrication );
2649 int loss = 60 - 2 *
2650 skill; // Inefficency is still fine, coal and limestone is abundant
2651
2652 // Burn stuff that should get charred, leave out the rest
2653 units::volume total_volume = 0_ml;
2654 for( const item &i : items ) {
2655 total_volume += i.volume();
2656 }
2657
2658 units::volume char_volume = ( 100 - loss ) * total_volume / 100;
2659 int char_charges = itype_unfinished_cac2->charges_per_volume( char_volume );
2660 if( char_charges < 1 ) {
2661 add_msg( _( "The batch in this furance is too small to yield usable calcium carbide." ) );
2662 return;
2663 }
2664 //arc furnaces require a huge amount of current, so 1 full storage battery would work as a stand in
2665 if( !p.has_charges( itype_UPS, 1250 ) ) {
2666 add_msg( _( "This furnace is ready to be turned on, but you lack a UPS with sufficient power." ) );
2667 return;
2668 } else {
2669 add_msg( _( "This furnace contains %s %s of material, and is ready to be turned on." ),
2670 format_volume( total_volume ), volume_units_abbr() );
2671 if( !query_yn( _( "Turn on the furnace?" ) ) ) {
2672 return;
2673 }
2674 }
2675
2676 p.use_charges( itype_UPS, 1250 );
2677 g->m.i_clear( examp );
2678 g->m.furn_set( examp, next_arcfurnace_type );
2679 item result( itype_unfinished_cac2, calendar::turn );
2680 result.charges = char_charges;
2681 g->m.add_item( examp, result );
2682 add_msg( _( "You turn on the furnace." ) );
2683}

void iexamine::arcfurnace_full ( player &  p,

2686{
2687 furn_id cur_arcfurnace_type = g->m.furn( examp );
2688 furn_id next_arcfurnace_type = f_null;
2689 if( cur_arcfurnace_type == f_arcfurnace_full ) {
2690 next_arcfurnace_type = f_arcfurnace_empty;
2691 } else {
2692 debugmsg( "Examined furniture has action arcfurnace_full, but is of type %s",
2693 g->m.furn( examp ).id().c_str() );
2694 return;
2695 }
2696
2697 map_stack items = g->m.i_at( examp );
2698 if( items.empty() ) {
2699 add_msg( _( "This furnace is empty…" ) );
2700 g->m.furn_set( examp, next_arcfurnace_type );
2701 return;
2702 }
2703 add_msg( _( "There's an arc furnace there." ) );
2704 const time_duration firing_time = 2_hours; // Arc furnaces work really fast in reality
2705 const time_duration time_left = firing_time - items.only_item().age();
2706 if( time_left > 0_turns ) {
2707 int hours = to_hours<int>( time_left );
2708 int minutes = to_minutes<int>( time_left ) + 1;
2709 if( minutes > 60 ) {
2710 add_msg( vgettext( "It will finish burning in about %d hour.",
2711 "It will finish burning in about %d hours.",
2712 hours ), hours );
2713 } else if( minutes > 30 ) {
2714 add_msg( _( "It will finish burning in less than an hour." ) );
2715 } else {
2716 add_msg( _( "It should take about %d minutes to finish burning." ), minutes );
2717 }
2718 return;
2719 }
2720
2721 units::volume total_volume = 0_ml;
2722 // Burn stuff that should get charred, leave out the rest
2723 for( auto item_it = items.begin(); item_it != items.end(); ) {
2724 if( item_it->typeId() == itype_unfinished_cac2 || item_it->typeId() == itype_chem_carbide ) {
2725 total_volume += item_it->volume();
2726 item_it = items.erase( item_it );
2727 } else {
2728 item_it++;
2729 }
2730 }
2731
2732 item result( itype_chem_carbide, calendar::turn );
2733 result.charges = itype_chem_carbide->charges_per_volume( total_volume );
2734 g->m.add_item( examp, result );
2735 g->m.furn_set( examp, next_arcfurnace_type );
2736 add_msg( _( "It has finished burning, yielding %d calcium carbide." ), result.charges );
2737}

◆ autoclave_empty()

void iexamine::autoclave_empty ( player &  p,
const tripoint &  examp 
)

Definition at line 2740 of file iexamine.cpp.

2741{
2742 furn_id cur_autoclave_type = g->m.furn( examp );
2743 furn_id next_autoclave_type = f_null;
2744 if( cur_autoclave_type == furn_id( "f_autoclave" ) ) {
2745 next_autoclave_type = furn_id( "f_autoclave_full" );
2746 } else {
2747 debugmsg( "Examined furniture has action autoclave_empty, but is of type %s",
2748 g->m.furn( examp ).id().c_str() );
2749 return;
2750 }
2751
2752 map_stack items = g->m.i_at( examp );
2753 bool cbms = std::all_of( items.begin(), items.end(), []( const item & i ) {
2754 return i.is_bionic();
2755 } );
2756
2757 bool filthy_cbms = std::all_of( items.begin(), items.end(), []( const item & i ) {
2758 return i.is_bionic() && i.has_flag( flag_FILTHY );
2759 } );
2760
2761 if( items.empty() ) {
2762 add_msg( _( "This autoclave is empty…" ) );
2763 return;
2764 }
2765 if( !cbms ) {
2766 add_msg( m_bad,
2767 _( "You need to remove all non-CBM items from the autoclave to start the program." ) );
2768 return;
2769 }
2770 if( filthy_cbms ) {
2771 add_msg( m_bad,
2772 _( "Some of those CBMs are filthy, you should wash them first for the sterilization process to work properly." ) );
2773 return;
2774 }
2775 auto reqs = *requirement_id( "autoclave" );
2776
2777 if( !reqs.can_make_with_inventory( p.crafting_inventory(), is_crafting_component ) ) {
2778 popup( "%s", reqs.list_missing() );
2779 return;
2780 }
2781
2782 if( query_yn( _( "Start the autoclave?" ) ) ) {
2783
2784 for( const auto &e : reqs.get_components() ) {
2785 p.consume_items( e, 1, is_crafting_component );
2786 }
2787 for( const auto &e : reqs.get_tools() ) {
2788 p.consume_tools( e );
2789 }
2790 p.invalidate_crafting_inventory();
2791 for( item &it : items ) {
2792 it.set_birthday( calendar::turn );
2793 }
2794 g->m.furn_set( examp, next_autoclave_type );
2795 add_msg( _( "You start the autoclave." ) );
2796 }

5046 _( "The autodoc detected an open wound on your %s and applied a disinfectant to clean it." ),
5047 _( "The autodoc detected an open wound on <npcname>'s %s and applied a disinfectant to clean it." ),
5048 body_part_name( bp_healed ) );
5049

5051 const int disinfectant_intensity = 14;
5052 patient.add_effect( effect_disinfected, 1_turns, bp_healed->token );

5054 e.set_duration( e.get_int_dur_factor() * disinfectant_intensity );

5057 patient.get_part_hp_max( bp_healed ) - patient.get_part_hp_cur( bp_healed );
5058
5059 }
5060 }

5065 case RAD_AWAY: {
5066 patient.moves -= 500;

5075 _( "The autodoc detected an anti-radiation drug in <npcname>'s bloodstream, so it decided not to administer another dose right now." ) );
5076 } else {

5079 patient.mod_pain( 3 );
5080 patient.add_effect( effect_pblue, 1_hours );
5081 }
5082 }
5083 if( patient.leak_level( "RADIOACTIVE" ) ) {
5084 popup( _( "Warning! Autodoc detected a radiation leak of %d mSv from items in patient's possession. Urgent decontamination procedures highly recommended." ),
5085 patient.leak_level( "RADIOACTIVE" ) );
5086 }
5087 break;
5088 }
5089
5090 case BLOOD_ANALYSIS: {
5091 patient.moves -= 500;
5092 patient.conduct_blood_analysis();
5093 patient.add_msg_player_or_npc( m_info,
5094 _( "The autodoc analyzed your blood." ),
5095 _( "The autodoc analyzed <npcname>'s blood." ) );
5096 break;
5097 }
5098
5099 default:
5100 return;
5101 }

1200{
1201 if( !( p.has_trait( trait_AMORPHOUS ) ) ) {
1202 none( p, examp );
1203 return;
1204 }
1205 if( ( ( p.encumb( bp_torso ) ) >= 10 ) && ( ( p.encumb( bp_head ) ) >= 10 ) &&
1206 ( p.encumb( bp_foot_l ) >= 10 ||
1207 p.encumb( bp_foot_r ) >= 10 ) ) { // Most likely places for rigid gear that would catch on the bars.

1209 _( "Your amorphous body could slip though the %s, but your cumbersome gear can't." ),
1210 g->m.tername( examp ) );
1211 return;
1212 }

1214 none( p, examp );
1215 return;
1216 }

◆ cardreader()

void iexamine::cardreader ( player &  p,
const tripoint &  examp 
)

Use id/hack reader.

Using an id despawns turrets.

Definition at line 1011 of file iexamine.cpp.

1012{
1013 bool open = false;
1014 itype_id card_type = ( g->m.ter( examp ) == t_card_science ? itype_id_science :
1015 g->m.ter( examp ) == t_card_military ? itype_id_military :
1016 itype_id_industrial );
1017 if( p.has_amount( card_type, 1 ) && query_yn( _( "Swipe your ID card?" ) ) ) {
1018 p.mod_moves( -to_turns<int>( 1_seconds ) );
1019 for( const tripoint &tmp : g->m.points_in_radius( examp, 3 ) ) {
1020 if( g->m.ter( tmp ) == t_door_metal_locked ) {
1021 g->m.ter_set( tmp, t_door_metal_c );
1022 open = true;
1023 }
1024 }
1025 for( monster &critter : g->all_monsters() ) {
1026 // Check 1) same overmap coords, 2) turret, 3) hostile
1027 if( ms_to_omt_copy( g->m.getabs( critter.pos() ) ) == ms_to_omt_copy( g->m.getabs( examp ) ) &&
1028 critter.has_flag( MF_ID_CARD_DESPAWN ) &&
1029 critter.attitude_to( p ) == Creature::Attitude::A_HOSTILE ) {
1030 g->remove_zombie( critter );
1031 }
1032 }
1033 if( open ) {
1034 add_msg( _( "You insert your ID card." ) );
1035 add_msg( m_good, _( "The nearby doors unlock." ) );
1036 p.use_amount( card_type, 1 );
1037 } else {
1038 add_msg( _( "The nearby doors are already opened." ) );
1039 }
1040 } else if( query_yn( _( "Attempt to hack this card-reader?" ) ) ) {
1041 try_start_hacking( p, examp );
1042 }

Prompt climbing over fence.

Calculates move cost, applies it to player and, moves them.

Dexterity decreases chances of slipping while climbing

1146{
1147 // We're not going to do anything if we're already on that point.
1148 // Also prompt the player before taking an action.
1149 if( p.pos() == examp || !query_yn( _( "Climb obstacle?" ) ) ) {
1150 none( p, examp );
1151 return;
1152 }
1153
1154 if( g->m.has_flag( flag_CLIMB_SIMPLE, examp ) && p.has_trait( trait_PARKOUR ) ) {
1155 add_msg( _( "You vault over the obstacle with ease." ) );
1156 p.moves -= 100; // Not tall enough to warrant spider-climbing, so only relevant trait.
1157 } else if( g->m.has_flag( flag_CLIMB_SIMPLE, examp ) ) {
1158 add_msg( _( "You vault over the obstacle." ) );
1159 p.moves -= 300; // Most common move cost for barricades pre-change.
1160 } else if( p.has_trait( trait_ARACHNID_ARMS_OK ) &&
1161 !p.wearing_something_on( bodypart_id( "torso" ) ) ) {
1162 add_msg( _( "Climbing this obstacle is trivial for one such as you." ) );
1163 p.moves -= 75; // Yes, faster than walking. 6-8 limbs are impressive.
1164 } else if( p.has_trait( trait_INSECT_ARMS_OK ) &&
1165 !p.wearing_something_on( bodypart_id( "torso" ) ) ) {
1166 add_msg( _( "You quickly scale the fence." ) );
1167 p.moves -= 90;
1168 } else if( p.has_trait( trait_PARKOUR ) ) {
1169 add_msg( _( "This obstacle is no match for your freerunning abilities." ) );
1170 p.moves -= 100;
1171 } else {

1173 ///\EFFECT_DEX decreases chances of slipping while climbing

1176 climb = climb / 2;
1177 }

252{
253 // Select an item to which it is possible to apply a diamond coating
254 auto loc = g->inv_map_splice( []( const item & e ) {
255 return ( e.is_melee( DT_CUT ) || e.is_melee( DT_STAB ) ) && e.made_of( material_id( "steel" ) ) &&
256 !e.has_flag( flag_DIAMOND ) && !e.has_flag( flag_NO_CVD );
257 }, _( "Apply diamond coating" ), 1, _( "You don't have a suitable item to coat with diamond" ) );
258
259 if( !loc ) {
260 return;
261 }
262
263 // Require materials proportional to selected item volume
264 auto qty = loc->volume() / units::legacy_volume_factor;
265 qty = std::max( 1, qty );
266 auto reqs = *requirement_id( "cvd_diamond" ) * qty;
267
268 if( !reqs.can_make_with_inventory( p.crafting_inventory(), is_crafting_component ) ) {
269 popup( "%s", reqs.list_missing() );
270 return;
271 }
272
273 // Consume materials
274 for( const auto &e : reqs.get_components() ) {
275 p.consume_items( e, 1, is_crafting_component );
276 }
277 for( const auto &e : reqs.get_tools() ) {
278 p.consume_tools( e );
279 }
280 p.invalidate_crafting_inventory();
281
282 // Apply flag to item
283 loc->set_flag( "DIAMOND" );
284 add_msg( m_good, _( "You apply a diamond coating to your %s" ), loc->type_name() );
285 p.mod_moves( -to_turns<int>( 10_seconds ) );
286}

2213 return itm.is_seed();

1661 if( g->m.has_flag( flag_OPENCLOSE_INSIDE, examp ) ) {
1662 locked_object( p, examp );
1663 } else {
1664 p.add_msg_if_player( _( "You cannot look through the peephole from the outside." ) );
1665 }
1666
1667 return;
1668 }
1669
1670 // Peek through the peephole, or open the door.
1671 const int choice = uilist( _( "Do what with the door?" ), {
1672 _( "Peek through peephole." ),
1673 _( "Open door." )
1674 } );
1675 if( choice == 0 ) {
1676 // Peek
1677 g->peek( examp );
1678 p.add_msg_if_player( _( "You peek through the peephole." ) );
1679 } else if( choice == 1 ) {
1680 g->m.open_door( examp, true, false );
1681 p.add_msg_if_player( _( "You open the door." ) );
1682 } else {
1683 p.add_msg_if_player( _( "Never mind." ) );
1684 }
1685}

void iexamine::egg_sack_generic ( player &  p,
const tripoint &  examp,
const mtype_id &  montype 
)

Spawn spiders from a spider egg sack in radius 1 around the egg sack.

Transforms the egg sack furniture into a ruptured egg sack (f_egg_sacke). Also spawns eggs.

Parameters
pThe player
exampLocation of egg sack
montypeThe monster type of the created spiders.

Definition at line 2075 of file iexamine.cpp.

2077{
2078 const std::string old_furn_name = g->m.furnname( examp );
2079 if( !query_yn( _( "Harvest the %s?" ), old_furn_name ) ) {
2080 none( p, examp );
2081 return;
2082 }
2083 g->m.furn_set( examp, f_egg_sacke );
2084 int monster_count = 0;
2085 if( one_in( 2 ) ) {
2086 for( const tripoint &nearby_pos : closest_points_first( examp, 1 ) ) {
2087 if( !one_in( 3 ) ) {
2088 continue;
2089 } else if( g->place_critter_at( montype, nearby_pos ) ) {
2090 monster_count++;
2091 }
2092 }
2093 }
2094 int roll = rng( 4, 20 );
2095 bool drop_eggs = monster_count >= 1;
2096 for( int i = 0; i < roll; i++ ) {
2097 handle_harvest( p, "spider_egg", drop_eggs );
2098 }
2099 if( monster_count == 1 ) {
2100 add_msg( m_warning, _( "A spiderling bursts from the %s!" ), old_furn_name );
2101 } else if( monster_count >= 1 ) {
2102 add_msg( m_warning, _( "Spiderlings burst from the %s!" ), old_furn_name );
2103 }
2104}

◆ elevator()

void iexamine::elevator ( player &  p,
const tripoint &  examp 
)

If underground, move 2 levels up else move 2 levels down.

Stable movement between levels 0 and -2.

Definition at line 871 of file iexamine.cpp.

872{
873 map &here = get_map();
874
875 if( !query_yn( _( "Use the %s?" ), here.tername( examp ) ) ) {
876 return;
877 }
878 int movez = ( examp.z < 0 ? 2 : -2 );
879
880 tripoint original_floor_omt = ms_to_omt_copy( here.getabs( examp ) );
881 tripoint new_floor_omt = original_floor_omt + tripoint( point_zero, movez );
882
883
884 // first find critters in the destination elevator and move them out of the way
885 for( Creature &critter : g->all_creatures() ) {
886 if( critter.is_player() ) {
887 continue;
888 } else if( here.has_flag( flag_ELEVATOR, critter.pos() ) ) {
889 tripoint critter_omt = ms_to_omt_copy( here.getabs( critter.pos() ) );
890 if( critter_omt == new_floor_omt ) {
891 for( const tripoint &candidate : closest_points_first( critter.pos(), 10 ) ) {
892 if( !here.has_flag( flag_ELEVATOR, candidate ) &&
893 here.passable( candidate ) &&
894 !g->critter_at( candidate ) ) {
895 critter.setpos( candidate );
896 break;
897 }
898 }
899 }
900 }
901 }
902
903 // TODO: do we have struct or pair to indicate from -> to?
904 const auto move_item = [&]( map_stack & items, const tripoint & src, const tripoint & dest ) {
905 for( auto it = items.begin(); it != items.end(); ) {
906 here.add_item_or_charges( dest, *it );
907 it = here.i_rem( src, it );
908 }
909 };
910
911 const auto first_elevator_tile = [&]( const tripoint & pos ) -> tripoint {
912 for( const tripoint &candidate : closest_points_first( pos, 10 ) )
913 {
914 if( here.has_flag( flag_ELEVATOR, candidate ) ) {
915 return candidate;
916 }
917 }
918 return pos;
919 };
920
921 // move along every item in the elevator
922 for( const tripoint &pos : closest_points_first( p.pos(), 10 ) ) {
923 if( here.has_flag( flag_ELEVATOR, pos ) ) {
924 map_stack items = here.i_at( pos );
925 tripoint dest = first_elevator_tile( pos + tripoint( 0, 0, movez ) );
926 move_item( items, pos, dest );
927 }
928 }
929
930 // move the player
931 g->vertical_move( movez, false );
932
933 // finally, bring along everyone who was in the elevator with the player
934 for( Creature &critter : g->all_creatures() ) {
935 if( critter.is_player() ) {
936 continue;
937 } else if( here.has_flag( flag_ELEVATOR, critter.pos() ) ) {
938 tripoint critter_omt = ms_to_omt_copy( here.getabs( critter.pos() ) );
939
940 if( critter_omt == original_floor_omt ) {
941 for( const tripoint &candidate : closest_points_first( p.pos(), 10 ) ) {
942 if( here.has_flag( flag_ELEVATOR, candidate ) &&
943 candidate != p.pos() &&
944 !g->critter_at( candidate ) ) {
945 critter.setpos( candidate );
946 break;
947 }
948 }
949 }
950 }
951 }
952}

void iexamine::fertilize_plant ( player &  p,

)

Definition at line 2374 of file iexamine.cpp.

2375{
2376 ret_val<bool> can_fert = can_fertilize( p, tile, fertilizer );
2377 if( !can_fert.success() ) {
2378 debugmsg( can_fert.str() );
2379 return;
2380 }
2381
2382 std::list<item> planted = p.use_charges( fertilizer, 1 );
2383
2384 // Reduce the amount of time it takes until the next stage of the plant by
2385 // 20% of a seasons length. (default 2.8 days).
2386 const time_duration fertilizerEpoch = calendar::season_length() * 0.2;
2387
2388 // Can't use item_stack::only_item() since there might be fertilizer
2389 map_stack items = g->m.i_at( tile );
2390 const map_stack::iterator seed = std::find_if( items.begin(), items.end(), []( const item & it ) {
2391 return it.is_seed();
2392 } );
2393 if( seed == items.end() ) {
2394 debugmsg( "Missing seed for plant at (%d, %d, %d)", tile.x, tile.y, tile.z );
2395 g->m.i_clear( tile );
2396 g->m.furn_set( tile, f_null );
2397 return;
2398 }
2399
2400 // TODO: item should probably clamp the value on its own
2401 seed->set_birthday( seed->birthday() - fertilizerEpoch );
2402 // The plant furniture has the NOITEM token which prevents adding items on that square,
2403 // spawned items are moved to an adjacent field instead, but the fertilizer token
2404 // must be on the square of the plant, therefore this hack:
2405 const auto old_furn = g->m.furn( tile );
2406 g->m.furn_set( tile, f_null );
2407 g->m.spawn_item( tile, itype_fertilizer, 1, 1, calendar::turn );
2408 g->m.furn_set( tile, old_furn );
2409 p.mod_moves( -to_moves<int>( 10_seconds ) );
2410
2411 //~ %1$s: plant name, %2$s: fertilizer name
2412 add_msg( m_info, _( "You fertilize the %1$s with the %2$s." ), seed->get_plant_name(),
2413 planted.front().tname() );
2414}

◆ fireplace()

void iexamine::fireplace ( player &  p,

)

2857{
2858 const bool already_on_fire = g->m.has_nearby_fire( examp, 0 );
2859 const bool furn_is_deployed = !g->m.furn( examp ).obj().deployed_item.is_empty();
2860
2861 std::multimap<int, item *> firestarters;
2862 for( item *it : p.items_with( []( const item & it ) {
2863 return it.has_flag( flag_FIRESTARTER ) || it.has_flag( flag_FIRE );
2864 } ) ) {
2865 const auto usef = it->type->get_use( "firestarter" );
2866 if( usef != nullptr && usef->get_actor_ptr() != nullptr ) {
2867 const auto actor = dynamic_cast<const firestarter_actor *>( usef->get_actor_ptr() );
2868 if( actor->can_use( p, *it, false, examp ).success() ) {
2869 firestarters.insert( std::pair<int, item *>( actor->moves_cost_fast, it ) );
2870 }
2871 }
2872 }
2873
2874 const bool has_firestarter = !firestarters.empty();
2875 const bool has_bionic_firestarter = p.has_bionic( bio_lighter ) &&
2876 p.enough_power_for( bio_lighter );
2877
2878 uilist selection_menu;
2879 selection_menu.text = _( "Select an action" );
2880 selection_menu.addentry( 0, true, 'g', _( "Get items" ) );
2881 if( !already_on_fire ) {
2882 selection_menu.addentry( 1, has_firestarter, 'f',
2883 has_firestarter ? _( "Start a fire" ) : _( "Start a fire… you'll need a fire source." ) );
2884 if( has_bionic_firestarter ) {
2885 selection_menu.addentry( 2, true, 'b', _( "Use a CBM to start a fire" ) );
2886 }
2887 } else {
2888 selection_menu.addentry( 4, true, 'e', _( "Extinguish fire" ) );
2889 }
2890 if( furn_is_deployed ) {
2891 selection_menu.addentry( 3, true, 't', _( "Take down the %s" ), g->m.furnname( examp ) );
2892 }
2893 selection_menu.query();
2894
2895 switch( selection_menu.ret ) {
2896 case 0:
2897 none( p, examp );
2898 pickup::pick_up( examp, 0 );
2899 return;
2900 case 1: {
2901 for( auto &firestarter : firestarters ) {
2902 item *it = firestarter.second;
2903 const auto usef = it->type->get_use( "firestarter" );
2904 const auto actor = dynamic_cast<const firestarter_actor *>( usef->get_actor_ptr() );
2905 p.add_msg_if_player( _( "You attempt to start a fire with your %s…" ), it->tname() );
2906 const ret_val<bool> can_use = actor->can_use( p, *it, false, examp );
2907 if( can_use.success() ) {
2908 const int charges = actor->use( p, *it, false, examp );
2909 p.use_charges( it->typeId(), charges );
2910 return;
2911 } else {
2912 p.add_msg_if_player( m_bad, can_use.str() );
2913 }
2914 }
2915 p.add_msg_if_player( _( "You weren't able to start a fire." ) );
2916 return;
2917 }
2918 case 2: {
2919 if( !g->m.get_field( examp, fd_fire ) && g->m.add_field( examp, fd_fire, 1 ) ) {
2920 p.mod_power_level( -bio_lighter->power_activate );
2921 p.mod_moves( -to_moves<int>( 1_seconds ) );
2922 } else {
2923 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You can't light a fire there." ) );
2924 }
2925 return;
2926 }
2927 case 3: {
2928 if( already_on_fire ) {
2929 if( !query_yn( _( "Really take down the %s while it's on fire?" ), g->m.furnname( examp ) ) ) {
2930 return;
2931 }
2932 }
2933 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You take down the %s." ),
2934 g->m.furnname( examp ) );
2935 const auto furn_item = g->m.furn( examp ).obj().deployed_item;
2936 g->m.add_item_or_charges( examp, item( furn_item, calendar::turn ) );
2937 g->m.furn_set( examp, f_null );
2938 return;
2939 }
2940 case 4: {
2941 g->m.remove_field( examp, fd_fire );
2942 p.mod_moves( -200 );
2943 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "With a few determined moves you put out the fire in the %s." ),
2944 g->m.furnname( examp ) );
2945 return;
2946 }
2947 default:
2948 none( p, examp );
2949 return;
2950 }
2951}

2052 }
2053 p.moves -= to_moves<int>( 30_seconds ); // Takes 30 seconds
2054 add_msg( m_bad, _( "This flower tastes very wrong…" ) );
2055 // If you can drink flowers, you're post-thresh and the Mycus does not want you.
2056 p.add_effect( effect_teleglow, 10_minutes );
2057 }
2058 if( !query_yn( _( "Pick %s?" ), g->m.furnname( examp ) ) ) {
2059 none( p, examp );
2060 return;
2061 }
2062 g->m.furn_set( examp, f_null );
2063 g->m.spawn_item( p.pos(), itype_marloss_seed, 1, 3, calendar::turn );
2064 handle_harvest( p, "withered", false );
2065}

void iexamine::flower_poppy ( player &  p,

Prompt pick (or drink nectar if able) poppy bud.

Not safe for player.

Drinking causes: -25 hunger, +20 fatigue, pkill2-70 effect and, 1 in 20 pkiller-1 addiction. Picking w/ env_resist < 5 causes 1 in 3 sleep for 12 min and 4 dmg to each leg

void iexamine::gaspump ( player &  p,

Use "gas pump." Will pump any liquids on tile.

Dexterity decreases chance of spilling gas from a pump Dexterity decreases amount of gas spilled from a pump

Definition at line 345 of file iexamine.cpp.

346{
347 if( !query_yn( _( "Use the %s?" ), g->m.tername( examp ) ) ) {
348 none( p, examp );
349 return;
350 }
351
352 auto items = g->m.i_at( examp );

356 if( one_in( 10 + p.get_dex() ) ) {
357 add_msg( m_bad, _( "You accidentally spill the %s." ), item_it->type_name() );
358 static const auto max_spill_volume = units::from_liter( 1 );
359 const int max_spill_charges = std::max( 1, item_it->charges_per_volume( max_spill_volume ) );
360 ///\EFFECT_DEX decreases amount of gas spilled from a pump
361 const int qty = rng( 1, max_spill_charges * 8.0 / std::max( 1, p.get_dex() ) );
362
363 item spill = item_it->split( qty );
364 if( spill.is_null() ) {
365 g->m.add_item_or_charges( p.pos(), *item_it );
366 items.erase( item_it );
367 } else {
368 g->m.add_item_or_charges( p.pos(), spill );
369 }
370
371 } else {
372 liquid_handler::handle_liquid_from_ground( item_it, examp, 1 );
373 }
374 return;
375 }
376 }
377 add_msg( m_info, _( "Out of order." ) );
378}

◆ get_harvest_items()

std::list< item > iexamine::get_harvest_items ( const itype &  type,
int  plant_count,
int  seed_count,
bool  byproducts 
)

Items that appear when a generic plant is harvested.

Seed islot_seed.

Parameters
typeThe seed type, must have a itype::seed slot.
plant_countNumber of fruits to generate. For charge-based items, this specifies multiples of the default charge.
seed_countNumber of seeds to generate.
byproductsIf true, byproducts (like straw, withered plants, see islot_seed::byproducts) are included.

Definition at line 2247 of file iexamine.cpp.

2249{
2250 std::list<item> result;
2251 if( !type.seed ) {
2252 return result;
2253 }
2254 const islot_seed &seed_data = *type.seed;
2255 // This is a temporary measure, itype should instead provide appropriate accessors
2256 // to expose data about the seed item to allow harvesting to function.
2257 const itype_id &seed_type = type.get_id();
2258
2259 const auto add = [&]( const itype_id & id, const int count ) {
2260 item new_item( id, calendar::turn );
2261 if( new_item.count_by_charges() && count > 0 ) {
2262 new_item.charges *= count;
2263 new_item.charges /= seed_data.fruit_div;
2264 if( new_item.charges <= 0 ) {
2265 new_item.charges = 1;
2266 }
2267 result.push_back( new_item );
2268 } else if( count > 0 ) {
2269 result.insert( result.begin(), count, new_item );
2270 }
2271 };
2272
2273 if( seed_data.spawn_seeds ) {
2274 add( seed_type, seed_count );
2275 }
2276
2277 add( seed_data.fruit_id, plant_count );
2278
2279 if( byproducts ) {
2280 for( auto &b : seed_data.byproducts ) {
2281 add( b, 1 );
2282 }
2283 }
2284
2285 return result;
2286}

3197 } );

3199 return it.made_of( LIQUID );
3200 } );
3201
3202 if( !liquid_present || has_container_with_liquid ) {
3203 add_msg( m_info, _( "It is empty." ) );
3204 // Get list of all drinks
3205 auto drinks_inv = p.items_with( []( const item & it ) {
3206 return it.made_of( LIQUID );
3207 } );
3208 if( drinks_inv.empty() ) {
3209 add_msg( m_info, _( "You don't have any drinks to fill the %s with." ), keg_name );
3210 return;
3211 }
3212 // Make lists of unique drinks... about third time we do this, maybe we ought to make a function next time
3213 std::vector<itype_id> drink_types;
3214 std::vector<std::string> drink_names;
3215 std::vector<double> drink_rot;
3216 for( auto &drink : drinks_inv ) {
3217 auto found_drink = std::find( drink_types.begin(), drink_types.end(), drink->typeId() );
3218 if( found_drink == drink_types.end() ) {
3219 drink_types.push_back( drink->typeId() );
3220 drink_names.push_back( item::nname( drink->typeId() ) );
3221 drink_rot.push_back( drink->get_relative_rot() );
3222 } else {
3223 auto rot_iter = std::next( drink_rot.begin(), std::distance( drink_types.begin(), found_drink ) );
3224 // Yep, worst rot wins.
3225 *rot_iter = std::max( *rot_iter, drink->get_relative_rot() );
3226 }
3227 }
3228 // Choose drink to store in keg from list
3229 int drink_index = 0;
3230 if( drink_types.size() > 1 ) {
3231 drink_index = uilist( _( "Store which drink?" ), drink_names );
3232 if( drink_index < 0 || static_cast<size_t>( drink_index ) >= drink_types.size() ) {
3233 drink_index = -1;
3234 }
3235 } else { //Only one drink type was in inventory, so it's automatically used
3236 if( !query_yn( _( "Fill the %1$s with %2$s?" ),
3237 keg_name, drink_names[0].c_str() ) ) {
3238 drink_index = -1;
3239 }
3240 }
3241 if( drink_index < 0 ) {
3242 return;
3243 }
3244
3245 // First empty the keg of foreign objects
3246 displace_items_except_one_liquid( examp );
3247
3248 //Store liquid chosen in the keg
3249 itype_id drink_type = drink_types[ drink_index ];
3250 int charges_held = p.charges_of( drink_type );
3251 item drink( drink_type, calendar::start_of_cataclysm );
3252 drink.set_relative_rot( drink_rot[ drink_index ] );
3253 drink.charges = 0;
3254 bool keg_full = false;
3255 for( int i = 0; i < charges_held && !keg_full; i++ ) {
3256 g->u.use_charges( drink.typeId(), 1 );
3257 drink.charges++;
3258 keg_full = drink.volume() >= keg_cap;
3259 }
3260 if( keg_full ) {
3261 add_msg( _( "You completely fill the %1$s with %2$s." ),
3262 keg_name, item::nname( drink_type ) );
3263 } else {
3264 add_msg( _( "You fill the %1$s with %2$s." ),
3265 keg_name, item::nname( drink_type ) );
3266 }
3267 p.moves -= to_moves<int>( 10_seconds );
3268 g->m.i_clear( examp );
3269 g->m.add_item( examp, drink );
3270 return;
3271 } else {
3272 // First empty the keg of foreign objects
3273 displace_items_except_one_liquid( examp );
3274
3275 map_stack items = g->m.i_at( examp );
3276 item &drink = items.only_item();
3277 const std::string drink_tname = drink.tname();
3278 const std::string drink_nname = item::nname( drink.typeId() );
3279 enum options {
3280 DISPENSE,
3281 HAVE_A_DRINK,
3282 REFILL,
3283 EXAMINE,
3284 };
3285 uilist selectmenu;
3286 selectmenu.addentry( DISPENSE, drink.made_of( LIQUID ), MENU_AUTOASSIGN,
3287 _( "Dispense or dump %s" ), drink_tname );
3288 selectmenu.addentry( HAVE_A_DRINK, drink.is_food() && drink.made_of( LIQUID ),
3289 MENU_AUTOASSIGN, _( "Have a drink" ) );
3290 selectmenu.addentry( REFILL, true, MENU_AUTOASSIGN, _( "Refill" ) );
3291 selectmenu.addentry( EXAMINE, true, MENU_AUTOASSIGN, _( "Examine" ) );
3292
3293 selectmenu.text = _( "Select an action" );
3294 selectmenu.query();
3295
3296 switch( selectmenu.ret ) {
3297 case DISPENSE:
3298 if( liquid_handler::handle_liquid_from_ground( items.begin(), examp ) ) {
3299 add_msg( _( "You squeeze the last drops of %1$s from the %2$s." ),
3300 drink_tname, keg_name );
3301 }
3302 return;
3303
3304 case HAVE_A_DRINK:
3305 if( !p.eat( drink ) ) {
3306 return; // They didn't actually drink
3307 }
3308
3309 if( drink.charges == 0 ) {
3310 add_msg( _( "You squeeze the last drops of %1$s from the %2$s." ),
3311 drink_tname, keg_name );
3312 g->m.i_clear( examp );
3313 }
3314 p.moves -= to_moves<int>( 5_seconds );
3315 return;
3316
3317 case REFILL: {
3318 if( drink.volume() >= keg_cap ) {
3319 add_msg( _( "The %s is completely full." ), keg_name );
3320 return;
3321 }
3322 int charges_held = p.charges_of( drink.typeId() );
3323 if( charges_held < 1 ) {
3324 add_msg( m_info, _( "You don't have any %1$s to fill the %2$s with." ),
3325 drink_nname, keg_name );
3326 return;
3327 }
3328 item tmp( drink.typeId(), calendar::turn, charges_held );
3329 pour_into_keg( examp, tmp );
3330 p.use_charges( drink.typeId(), charges_held - tmp.charges );
3331 add_msg( _( "You fill the %1$s with %2$s." ), keg_name, drink_nname );
3332 p.moves -= to_moves<int>( 10_seconds );
3333 return;
3334 }
3335
3336 case EXAMINE: {
3337 add_msg( m_info, _( "It contains %s (%d), %0.f%% full." ),
3338 drink_tname, drink.charges, drink.volume() * 100.0 / keg_cap );
3339 return;
3340 }
3341
3342 default:
3343 return;
3344 }
3345 }
3346}

2484{
2485 furn_id cur_kiln_type = g->m.furn( examp );

2487 if( cur_kiln_type == f_kiln_empty ) {
2488 next_kiln_type = f_kiln_full;
2489 } else if( cur_kiln_type == f_kiln_metal_empty ) {
2490 next_kiln_type = f_kiln_metal_full;
2491 } else {
2492 debugmsg( "Examined furniture has action kiln_empty, but is of type %s",
2493 g->m.furn( examp ).id().c_str() );
2494 return;
2495 }
2496
2497 static const std::set<material_id> kilnable{ material_id( "wood" ), material_id( "bone" ) };
2498 bool fuel_present = false;
2499 auto items = g->m.i_at( examp );
2500 for( const item &i : items ) {
2501 if( i.typeId() == itype_charcoal ) {
2502 add_msg( _( "This kiln already contains charcoal." ) );
2503 add_msg( _( "Remove it before firing the kiln again." ) );
2504 return;
2505 } else if( i.made_of_any( kilnable ) ) {
2506 fuel_present = true;
2507 } else {
2508 add_msg( m_bad, _( "This kiln contains %s, which can't be made into charcoal!" ), i.tname( 1,
2509 false ) );
2510 return;
2511 }
2512 }
2513
2514 if( !fuel_present ) {
2515 add_msg( _( "This kiln is empty. Fill it with wood or bone and try again." ) );
2516 return;
2517 }
2518
2519 ///\EFFECT_FABRICATION decreases loss when firing a kiln
2520 const int skill = p.get_skill_level( skill_fabrication );
2521 int loss = 60 - 2 *
2522 skill; // We can afford to be inefficient - logs and skeletons are cheap, charcoal isn't
2523
2524 // Burn stuff that should get charred, leave out the rest
2525 units::volume total_volume = 0_ml;
2526 for( const item &i : items ) {
2527 total_volume += i.volume();
2528 }
2529
2530 units::volume char_volume = ( 100 - loss ) * total_volume / 100;
2531 int char_charges = itype_unfinished_charcoal->charges_per_volume( char_volume );
2532 if( char_charges < 1 ) {
2533 add_msg( _( "The batch in this kiln is too small to yield any charcoal." ) );
2534 return;
2535 }
2536
2537 if( !p.has_charges( itype_fire, 1 ) ) {
2538 add_msg( _( "This kiln is ready to be fired, but you have no fire source." ) );
2539 return;
2540 } else {
2541 add_msg( _( "This kiln contains %s %s of material, and is ready to be fired." ),
2542 format_volume( total_volume ), volume_units_abbr() );
2543 if( !query_yn( _( "Fire the kiln?" ) ) ) {
2544 return;
2545 }
2546 }
2547
2548 p.use_charges( itype_fire, 1 );
2549 g->m.i_clear( examp );
2550 g->m.furn_set( examp, next_kiln_type );
2551 item result( itype_unfinished_charcoal, calendar::turn );
2552 result.charges = char_charges;
2553 g->m.add_item( examp, result );
2554 add_msg( _( "You fire the charcoal kiln." ) );
2555}

2579 const time_duration time_left = firing_time - items.only_item().age();

2581 int hours = to_hours<int>( time_left );

2583 if( minutes > 60 ) {
2584 add_msg( vgettext( "It will finish burning in about %d hour.",
2585 "It will finish burning in about %d hours.",
2586 hours ), hours );
2587 } else if( minutes > 30 ) {
2588 add_msg( _( "It will finish burning in less than an hour." ) );
2589 } else {
2590 add_msg( _( "It should take about %d minutes to finish burning." ), minutes );
2591 }
2592 return;
2593 }

2601 } else {
2602 item_it++;
2603 }
2604 }
2605

2607 result.charges = itype_charcoal->charges_per_volume( total_volume );
2608 g->m.add_item( examp, result );
2609 g->m.furn_set( examp, next_kiln_type );
2610 add_msg( _( "It has finished burning, yielding %d charcoal." ), result.charges );

4471 }
4472
4473 cmenu.query();
4474
4475 switch( cmenu.ret ) {
4476 case 1: {
4477 tripoint dest( p.posx() + 2 * sgn( examp.x - p.posx() ), p.posy() + 2 * sgn( examp.y - p.posy() ),
4478 p.posz() );
4479 if( p.get_str() < 4 ) {
4480 add_msg( m_warning, _( "You are too weak to jump over an obstacle." ) );
4481 } else if( 100 * p.weight_carried() / p.weight_capacity() > 25 ) {
4482 add_msg( m_warning, _( "You are too burdened to jump over an obstacle." ) );
4483 } else if( !g->m.valid_move( examp, dest, false, true ) ) {
4484 add_msg( m_warning, _( "You cannot jump over an obstacle - something is blocking the way." ) );
4485 } else if( g->critter_at( dest ) ) {
4486 add_msg( m_warning, _( "You cannot jump over an obstacle - there is %s blocking the way." ),
4487 g->critter_at( dest )->disp_name() );
4488 } else if( g->m.ter( dest ).obj().trap == tr_ledge ) {
4489 add_msg( m_warning, _( "You are not going to jump over an obstacle only to fall down." ) );
4490 } else {
4491 add_msg( m_info, _( "You jump over an obstacle." ) );
4492 p.setpos( dest );
4493 }
4494 break;
4495 }
4496 case 2: {
4497 tripoint where = examp;
4498 tripoint below = examp;
4499 below.z--;
4500 while( g->m.valid_move( where, below, false, true ) ) {
4501 where.z--;
4502 below.z--;
4503 }
4504
4505 const int height = examp.z - where.z;
4506 if( height == 0 ) {
4507 p.add_msg_if_player( _( "You can't climb down there." ) );
4508 return;
4509 }
4510
4511 const bool has_grapnel = p.has_amount( itype_grapnel, 1 );
4512 const int climb_cost = p.climbing_cost( where, examp );
4513 const auto fall_mod = p.fall_damage_mod();
4514 std::string query_str = vgettext( "Looks like %d story. Jump down?",
4515 "Looks like %d stories. Jump down?",
4516 height );
4517
4518 if( height > 1 && !query_yn( query_str.c_str(), height ) ) {
4519 return;
4520 } else if( height == 1 ) {
4521 std::string query;
4522
4523 if( !has_grapnel ) {
4524 if( climb_cost <= 0 && fall_mod > 0.8 ) {
4525 query = _( "You probably won't be able to get up and jumping down may hurt. Jump?" );
4526 } else if( climb_cost <= 0 ) {
4527 query = _( "You probably won't be able to get back up. Climb down?" );
4528 } else if( climb_cost < 200 ) {
4529 query = _( "You should be able to climb back up easily if you climb down there. Climb down?" );
4530 } else {
4531 query = _( "You may have problems climbing back up. Climb down?" );
4532 }
4533 } else {
4534 query = _( "Use your grappling hook to climb down?" );
4535 }
4536
4537 if( !query_yn( query.c_str() ) ) {
4538 return;
4539 }
4540 }
4541
4542 p.moves -= to_moves<int>( 1_seconds + 1_seconds * fall_mod );
4543 p.setpos( examp );
4544
4545 if( has_grapnel ) {
4546 p.add_msg_if_player( _( "You tie the rope around your waist and begin to climb down." ) );
4547 }
4548
4549 if( climb_cost > 0 || rng_float( 0.8, 1.0 ) > fall_mod ) {
4550 // One tile of falling less (possibly zero)
4551 g->vertical_move( -1, true );
4552 }
4553 g->m.creature_on_trap( p );
4554 break;
4555 }
4556 case 3: {
4557
4558 if( !can_use_mutation_warn( trait_WEB_BRDIGE, p ) ) {
4559 break;
4560 }
4561 const int range = 6; //this means we could web across a gap of 5.
4562 int success_range = 0;
4563 bool success = false;
4564 for( int i = 2; i <= range; i++ ) {
4565 //break at the first non empty space encountered
4566 if( g->m.ter( tripoint( p.posx() + i * sgn( examp.x - p.posx() ),
4567 p.posy() + i * sgn( examp.y - p.posy() ), p.posz() ) ) != t_open_air ) {
4568 success_range = i;
4569 success = true;
4570 break;
4571 }
4572 }
4573 if( !success ) {
4574 p.add_msg_if_player( _( "There is nothing for your to attach your web to!" ) );
4575 } else {
4576 for( int i = 1; i < success_range; i++ ) {
4577 tripoint dest( p.posx() + i * sgn( examp.x - p.posx() ), p.posy() + i * sgn( examp.y - p.posy() ),
4578 p.posz() );
4579
4580 g->m.ter_set( dest, t_web_bridge );
4581 }
4582 p.mutation_spend_resources( trait_WEB_BRDIGE );
4583 }
4584 break;
4585 }
4586 default:
4587 popup( _( "You decided to step back from the ledge." ) );
4588 break;
4589 }

void iexamine::locked_object_pickable ( player &  p,

1484{
1485 std::vector<item *> picklocks = p.items_with( [&p]( const item & it ) {
1486 // Don't search for worn items such as hairpins
1487 if( p.get_item_position( &it ) >= -1 ) {
1488 return it.type->get_use( "picklock" ) != nullptr;
1489 }
1490 return false;
1491 } );

1496 return;
1497 }
1498
1499 // Sort by their picklock level.
1500 std::sort( picklocks.begin(), picklocks.end(), [&]( const item * a, const item * b ) {
1501 const auto actor_a = dynamic_cast<const pick_lock_actor *>
1502 ( a->type->get_use( "picklock" )->get_actor_ptr() );
1503 const auto actor_b = dynamic_cast<const pick_lock_actor *>
1504 ( b->type->get_use( "picklock" )->get_actor_ptr() );
1505 return actor_a->pick_quality > actor_b->pick_quality;
1506 } );

5323 result.unset_flag( flag_PROCESSING_RESULT );

bool iexamine::pour_into_keg ( const tripoint &  pos,

)

Pour liquid into a keg (furniture) on the map.

The transferred charges (if any) will be removed from the liquid item.

Returns
Whether any charges have been transferred at all.

3354{

3356 if( keg_cap <= 0_ml ) {
3357 return false;
3358 }
3359 const auto keg_name = g->m.name( pos );
3360
3361 map_stack stack = g->m.i_at( pos );

3363 g->m.add_item( pos, liquid );
3364 g->m.i_at( pos ).only_item().charges = 0; // Will be set later
3365 } else if( stack.only_item().typeId() != liquid.typeId() ) {

3367 keg_name, item::nname( stack.only_item().typeId() ) );

3369 }

3374 return false;

3379 drink.charges++;
3380 liquid.charges--;
3381 }
3382 return true;
3383}

5676 string_format( _( "Remove brake and start milling, milling will take about %s." ),

5678

5684

5691 _( "Apply brake to mill" ),
5692 _( "Applying the brake will stop milling process." ) );

5695 smenu.query();
5696
5697 switch( smenu.ret ) {
5698 case 0: { //inspect mill

5703 pop += string_format( _( "It should take about %s to finish milling." ),
5704 to_string_clipped( time_left ) ) + "\n";
5705 }
5706 } else {
5707 pop += colorize( _( "There's a mill here." ), c_green ) + "\n";
5708 }

5711 pop += _( "…that it is empty." );
5712 } else {

5715 pop += "\n" + colorize( _( "You see some grains that are not yet milled to fine flour." ),

5718 }

5721 }
5722 popup( pop, PF_NONE );

5724 }
5725 case 1:
5726 //activate
5727 if( active ) {
5728 add_msg( _( "It is already milling." ) );
5729 } else {

5731 }
5732 break;
5733 case 2:
5734 // load food
5735 mill_load_food( p, examp, remaining_capacity );

5737 case 3:
5738 // remove food
5739 for( map_stack::iterator it = items_here.begin(); it != items_here.end(); ) {
5740 if( it->typeId() != itype_fake_milling_item ) {
5741 // get handling cost before the item reference is invalidated
5742 const int handling_cost = -p.item_handling_cost( *it );
5743
5744 add_msg( _( "You remove %s from the mill." ), it->tname() );
5745 g->m.add_item_or_charges( p.pos(), *it );
5746 it = items_here.erase( it );
5747 p.mod_moves( handling_cost );
5748 } else {
5749 ++it;
5750 }
5751 }
5752 if( active ) {
5753 if( g->m.furn( examp ) == furn_str_id( "f_water_mill_active" ) ) {
5754 g->m.furn_set( examp, f_water_mill );
5755 } else if( g->m.furn( examp ) == furn_str_id( "f_wind_mill_active" ) ) {
5756 g->m.furn_set( examp, f_wind_mill );
5757 }
5758 add_msg( m_info, _( "You stop the milling process." ) );
5759 }
5760 break;
5761 default:
5762 add_msg( m_info, _( "Never mind." ) );
5763 break;
5764 case 4:
5765 if( g->m.furn( examp ) == furn_str_id( "f_water_mill_active" ) ) {
5766 g->m.furn_set( examp, f_water_mill );
5767 } else if( g->m.furn( examp ) == furn_str_id( "f_wind_mill_active" ) ) {
5768 g->m.furn_set( examp, f_wind_mill );
5769 }

void iexamine::recycle_compactor ( player &  p,

3633{
3634 // choose what metal to recycle
3635 auto metals = materials::get_compactable();
3636 uilist choose_metal;
3637 choose_metal.text = _( "Recycle what metal?" );
3638 for( auto &m : metals ) {
3639 choose_metal.addentry( m.name() );
3640 }
3641 choose_metal.query();
3642 int m_idx = choose_metal.ret;
3643 if( m_idx < 0 || m_idx >= static_cast<int>( metals.size() ) ) {
3644 add_msg( _( "Never mind." ) );
3645 return;
3646 }
3647 material_type m = metals.at( m_idx );
3648
3649 // check inputs and tally total mass
3650 auto inputs = g->m.i_at( examp );
3651 units::mass sum_weight = 0_gram;
3652 auto ca = m.compact_accepts();
3653 std::set<material_id> accepts( ca.begin(), ca.end() );
3654 accepts.insert( m.id );
3655 for( auto &input : inputs ) {
3656 if( !input.only_made_of( accepts ) ) {
3657 //~ %1$s: an item in the compactor , %2$s: desired compactor output material
3658 add_msg( _( "You realize this isn't going to work because %1$s is not made purely of %2$s." ),
3659 input.tname(), m.name() );
3660 return;
3661 }
3662 if( input.is_container() && !input.is_container_empty() ) {
3663 //~ %1$s: an item in the compactor
3664 add_msg( _( "You realize this isn't going to work because %1$s has not been emptied of its contents." ),
3665 input.tname() );
3666 return;
3667 }
3668 sum_weight += input.weight();
3669 }
3670 if( sum_weight <= 0_gram ) {
3671 //~ %1$s: desired compactor output material
3672 add_msg( _( "There is no %1$s in the compactor. Drop some metal items onto it and try again." ),
3673 m.name() );
3674 return;
3675 }
3676
3677 // See below for recover_factor (rng(6,9)/10), this
3678 // is the normal value of that recover factor.
3679 static const double norm_recover_factor = 8.0 / 10.0;
3680 const units::mass norm_recover_weight = sum_weight * norm_recover_factor;
3681
3682 // choose output
3683 uilist choose_output;
3684 //~ %1$.3f: total mass of material in compactor, %2$s: weight units , %3$s: compactor output material
3685 choose_output.text = string_format( _( "Compact %1$.3f %2$s of %3$s into:" ),
3686 convert_weight( sum_weight ), weight_units(), m.name() );
3687 for( auto &ci : m.compacts_into() ) {
3688 auto it = item( ci, calendar::start_of_cataclysm, item::solitary_tag{} );
3689 const int amount = norm_recover_weight / it.weight();
3690 //~ %1$d: number of, %2$s: output item
3691 choose_output.addentry( string_format( _( "about %1$d %2$s" ), amount,
3692 it.tname( amount ) ) );
3693 }
3694 choose_output.query();
3695 int o_idx = choose_output.ret;
3696 if( o_idx < 0 || o_idx >= static_cast<int>( m.compacts_into().size() ) ) {
3697 add_msg( _( "Never mind." ) );
3698 return;
3699 }
3700
3701 // remove items
3702 for( auto it = inputs.begin(); it != inputs.end(); ) {
3703 it = inputs.erase( it );
3704 }
3705
3706 // produce outputs
3707 double recover_factor = rng( 6, 9 ) / 10.0;
3708 sum_weight = sum_weight * recover_factor;
3709 sounds::sound( examp, 80, sounds::sound_t::combat, _( "Ka-klunk!" ), true, "tool", "compactor" );
3710 bool out_desired = false;
3711 bool out_any = false;
3712 for( auto it = m.compacts_into().begin() + o_idx; it != m.compacts_into().end(); ++it ) {
3713 const units::mass ow = item( *it, calendar::start_of_cataclysm, item::solitary_tag{} ).weight();
3714 int count = sum_weight / ow;
3715 sum_weight -= count * ow;
3716 if( count > 0 ) {
3717 g->m.spawn_item( examp, *it, count, 1, calendar::turn );
3718 if( !out_any ) {
3719 out_any = true;
3720 if( it == m.compacts_into().begin() + o_idx ) {
3721 out_desired = true;
3722 }
3723 }
3724 }
3725 }
3726
3727 // feedback to user
3728 if( !out_any ) {
3729 add_msg( _( "The compactor chews up all the items in its hopper." ) );
3730 //~ %1$s: compactor output material
3731 add_msg( _( "The compactor beeps: \"No %1$s to process!\"" ), m.name() );
3732 return;
3733 }
3734 if( !out_desired ) {
3735 //~ %1$s: compactor output material
3736 add_msg( _( "The compactor beeps: \"Insufficient %1$s!\"" ), m.name() );
3737 add_msg( _( "It spits out an assortment of smaller pieces instead." ) );
3738 }
3739}

◆ safe()

void iexamine::safe ( player &  p,
const tripoint &  examp 
)

Attempt to crack safe through audio-feedback manual lock manipulation.

Try to unlock the safe by moving the dial and listening for the mechanism to "click into place." Time per attempt affected by perception and mechanics. 30 minutes per attempt minimum. Small chance of just guessing the combo without listening device.

Perception speeds up safe cracking Mechanics speeds up safe cracking

◆ slot_machine()

void iexamine::slot_machine ( player &  p,
const tripoint &  examp 
)

Loop prompt to bet $10.

Definition at line 1353 of file iexamine.cpp.

1354{
1355 const int price = 10;
1356 auto cents = []( int x ) {
1357 return x * 100;
1358 };
1359 bool played = false;
1360 while( true ) {
1361 if( p.cash < cents( price ) ) {
1362 add_msg( m_info, _( "You need $%d to play." ), price );
1363 break;
1364 }
1365 if( !query_yn( played ? _( "Play again for $%d?" ) : _( "Insert $%d?" ), price ) ) {
1366 break;
1367 }
1368 p.cash -= cents( price );
1369 played = true;
1370 int won;
1371 if( one_in( 5 ) ) {
1372 won = price;
1373 popup( _( "Three cherries… you get your money back!" ) );
1374 } else if( one_in( 20 ) ) {
1375 won = 50;
1376 popup( _( "Three bells… you win $%d!" ), won );
1377 } else if( one_in( 50 ) ) {
1378 won = 200;
1379 popup( _( "Three stars… you win $%d!" ), won );
1380 } else if( one_in( 1000 ) ) {
1381 won = 3000;
1382 popup( _( "JACKPOT! You win $%d!" ), won );
1383 } else {
1384 won = 0;
1385 popup( _( "No win." ) );
1386 }
1387 p.cash += cents( won );
1388 }
1389}

5797 } else if( items_here.size() == 1 && items_here.begin()->typeId() == itype_fake_smoke_plume ) {
5798 debugmsg( "f_smoking_rack_active was empty, and had fake_smoke_plume!" );
5799 g->m.furn_set( examp, f_smoking_rack );
5800 items_here.erase( items_here.begin() );
5801 return;
5802 }
5803
5804 bool rem_f_opt = false;
5805 time_duration time_left = 0_turns;
5806 int hours_left = 0;
5807 int minutes_left = 0;
5808 units::volume f_volume = 0_ml;
5809 bool f_check = false;
5810
5811 for( const item &it : items_here ) {
5812 if( it.is_food() ) {
5813 f_check = true;
5814 f_volume += it.volume();
5815 }
5816 if( active && it.typeId() == itype_fake_smoke_plume ) {
5817 time_left = time_duration::from_turns( it.item_counter );
5818 hours_left = to_hours<int>( time_left );
5819 minutes_left = to_minutes<int>( time_left ) + 1;
5820 }
5821 }
5822
5823 const bool empty = f_volume == 0_ml;
5824 const bool full = f_volume >= sm_rack::MAX_FOOD_VOLUME;
5825 const bool full_portable = f_volume >= sm_rack::MAX_FOOD_VOLUME_PORTABLE;
5826 const auto remaining_capacity = sm_rack::MAX_FOOD_VOLUME - f_volume;
5827 const auto remaining_capacity_portable = sm_rack::MAX_FOOD_VOLUME_PORTABLE - f_volume;
5828 const auto has_coal_in_inventory = p.charges_of( itype_charcoal ) > 0;
5829 const auto coal_charges = count_charges_in_list( &*itype_charcoal, items_here );
5830 const auto need_charges = get_charcoal_charges( f_volume );
5831 const bool has_coal = coal_charges > 0;
5832 const bool has_enough_coal = coal_charges >= need_charges;
5833
5834 uilist smenu;
5835 smenu.text = _( "What to do with the smoking rack:" );
5836 smenu.desc_enabled = true;
5837
5838 smenu.addentry( 0, true, 'i', _( "Inspect smoking rack" ) );
5839
5840 if( !active ) {
5841 smenu.addentry_desc( 1, !empty && has_enough_coal, 'l',
5842 empty ? _( "Light up and smoke food… insert some food for smoking first" ) :
5843 !has_enough_coal ? string_format(
5844 _( "Light up and smoke food… need extra %d charges of charcoal" ),
5845 need_charges - coal_charges ) :
5846 _( "Light up and smoke food" ),
5847 _( "Light up the smoking rack and start smoking. Smoking will take about 6 hours." ) );
5848 if( portable ) {
5849 smenu.addentry_desc( 2, !full_portable, 'f',
5850 full_portable ? _( "Insert food for smoking… smoking rack is full" ) :
5851 string_format( _( "Insert food for smoking… remaining capacity is %s %s" ),
5852 format_volume( remaining_capacity_portable ), volume_units_abbr() ),
5853 _( "Fill the smoking rack with raw meat, fish or sausages for smoking or fruit or vegetable or smoked meat for drying." ) );
5854
5855 smenu.addentry_desc( 8, !active, 'z',
5856 active ? _( "You cannot disassemble this smoking rack while it is active!" ) :
5857 _( "Disassemble the smoking rack" ), "" );
5858
5859 } else {
5860 smenu.addentry_desc( 2, !full, 'f',
5861 full ? _( "Insert food for smoking… smoking rack is full" ) :
5862 string_format( _( "Insert food for smoking… remaining capacity is %s %s" ),
5863 format_volume( remaining_capacity ), volume_units_abbr() ),
5864 _( "Fill the smoking rack with raw meat, fish or sausages for smoking or fruit or vegetable or smoked meat for drying." ) );
5865 }
5866
5867 if( f_check ) {
5868 smenu.addentry( 4, f_check, 'e', _( "Remove food from smoking rack" ) );
5869 }
5870
5871 smenu.addentry_desc( 3, has_coal_in_inventory, 'r',
5872 !has_coal_in_inventory ? _( "Reload with charcoal… you don't have any" ) :
5873 _( "Reload with charcoal" ),
5874 string_format(
5875 _( "You need %d charges of charcoal for %s %s of food. Minimal amount of charcoal is %d charges." ),
5876 sm_rack::CHARCOAL_PER_LITER, format_volume( 1_liter ), volume_units_long(),
5877 sm_rack::MIN_CHARCOAL ) );
5878
5879 } else {
5880 smenu.addentry_desc( 7, true, 'x',
5881 _( "Quench burning charcoal" ),
5882 _( "Quenching will stop smoking process, but also destroy all used charcoal." ) );
5883 }
5884
5885 if( has_coal ) {
5886 smenu.addentry( 5, true, 'c',
5887 active ? string_format( _( "Rake out %d excess charges of charcoal from smoking rack" ),
5888 coal_charges ) :
5889 string_format( _( "Remove %d charges of charcoal from smoking rack" ), coal_charges ) );
5890 }
5891
5892 smenu.query();
5893
5894 switch( smenu.ret ) {
5895 case 0: { //inspect smoking rack
5896 std::string pop;
5897 if( active ) {
5898 pop += colorize( _( "There's a smoking rack here. It is lit and smoking." ), c_green ) + "\n";
5899 if( time_left > 0_turns ) {
5900 if( minutes_left > 60 ) {
5901 pop += string_format( vgettext( "It will finish smoking in about %d hour.",
5902 "It will finish smoking in about %d hours.",
5903 hours_left ), hours_left ) + "\n\n";
5904 } else if( minutes_left > 30 ) {
5905 pop += _( "It will finish smoking in less than an hour." ) + std::string( "\n" );
5906 } else {
5907 pop += string_format( _( "It should take about %d minutes to finish smoking." ),
5908 minutes_left ) + "\n ";
5909 }
5910 }
5911 } else {
5912 pop += colorize( _( "There's a smoking rack here." ), c_green ) + "\n";
5913 }
5914 pop += colorize( _( "You inspect its contents and find: " ), c_green ) + "\n";
5915 if( items_here.empty() ) {
5916 pop += _( "…that it is empty." );
5917 } else {
5918 for( const item &it : items_here ) {
5919 if( it.typeId() == itype_fake_smoke_plume ) {
5920 pop += "\n" + colorize( _( "You see some smoldering embers there." ), c_red ) + "\n";
5921 continue;
5922 }
5923 pop += "-> " + item::nname( it.typeId(), it.charges ) + " (" + std::to_string( it.charges ) + ")\n";
5924 }
5925 }
5926 popup( pop, PF_NONE );
5927 break;
5928 }
5929 case 1:
5930 //activate
5931 if( active ) {
5932 add_msg( _( "It is already lit and smoking." ) );
5933 } else {
5934 smoker_activate( p, examp );
5935 }
5936 break;
5937 case 2:
5938 // load food
5939 if( portable ) {
5940 smoker_load_food( p, examp, remaining_capacity_portable );
5941 } else {
5942 smoker_load_food( p, examp, remaining_capacity );
5943 }
5944 break;
5945 case 3:
5946 // load charcoal
5947 reload_furniture( p, examp );
5948 break;
5949 case 4:
5950 // remove food
5951 rem_f_opt = true;
5952 /* fallthrough */
5953 case 5: {
5954 //remove charcoal
5955 for( map_stack::iterator it = items_here.begin(); it != items_here.end(); ) {
5956 if( ( rem_f_opt && it->is_food() ) || ( !rem_f_opt && ( it->typeId() == itype_charcoal ) ) ) {
5957 // get handling cost before the item reference is invalidated
5958 const int handling_cost = -p.item_handling_cost( *it );
5959
5960 add_msg( _( "You remove %s from the rack." ), it->tname() );
5961 g->m.add_item_or_charges( p.pos(), *it );
5962 it = items_here.erase( it );
5963 p.mod_moves( handling_cost );
5964 } else {
5965 ++it;
5966 }
5967 }
5968 if( portable && active && rem_f_opt ) {
5969 g->m.furn_set( examp, f_metal_smoking_rack );
5970 add_msg( m_info, _( "You stop the smoking process." ) );
5971 } else if( active && rem_f_opt ) {
5972 g->m.furn_set( examp, f_smoking_rack );
5973 add_msg( m_info, _( "You stop the smoking process." ) );
5974 }
5975 }
5976 break;
5977 default:
5978 add_msg( m_info, _( "Never mind." ) );
5979 break;
5980 case 7:
5981 if( portable ) {
5982 g->m.furn_set( examp, f_metal_smoking_rack );
5983 add_msg( m_info, _( "You stop the smoking process." ) );
5984 } else {
5985 g->m.furn_set( examp, f_smoking_rack );
5986 add_msg( m_info, _( "You stop the smoking process." ) );
5987 }
5988 break;
5989 case 8:
5990 g->m.furn_set( examp, f_metal_smoking_rack );
5991 deployed_furniture( p, examp );
5992 break;
5993 }
5994}

Transform the examined object into the object specified by its transforms_into property.

If the new object has a message property, it is displayed as if the notify examine_action was used.

3745 return;
3746 }
3747 const int possible = tr.get_difficulty();

3749 if( tr.loadid == tr_unfinished_construction || g->m.partial_con_at( examp ) ) {
3750 partial_con *pc = g->m.partial_con_at( examp );
3751 if( pc ) {
3752 if( g->u.fine_detail_vision_mod() > 4 && !g->u.has_trait( trait_DEBUG_HS ) ) {
3753 add_msg( m_info, _( "It is too dark to construct right now." ) );
3754 return;

3762 g->m.add_item_or_charges( g->u.pos(), it );

3772 return;

◆ vending()

void iexamine::vending ( player &  p,
const tripoint &  examp 
)

Generates vending machine UI and allows players to purchase contained items with a cash card.

Definition at line 663 of file iexamine.cpp.

664{
665 constexpr int moves_cost = to_turns<int>( 5_seconds );
666 int money = p.charges_of( itype_cash_card );
667 auto vend_items = g->m.i_at( examp );
668
669 if( vend_items.empty() ) {
670 add_msg( m_info, _( "The vending machine is empty." ) );
671 return;
672 }
673
674 if( !money ) {
675 popup( _( "You need some money on a cash card to buy things." ) );
676 }
677
678 int w_items_w = 0;
679 int w_info_w = 0;
680 int list_lines = 0;
681 int lines_above = 0;
682 int lines_below = 0;
683 constexpr int first_item_offset = 3; // header size
684
685 catacurses::window w;
686 catacurses::window w_item_info;
687
688 ui_adaptor ui;
689 ui.on_screen_resize( [&]( ui_adaptor & ui ) {
690 const point padding( std::max( 0, TERMX - FULL_SCREEN_WIDTH ) / 4, std::max( 0,
691 TERMY - FULL_SCREEN_HEIGHT ) / 6 );
692 const int window_h = FULL_SCREEN_HEIGHT + std::max( 0, TERMY - FULL_SCREEN_HEIGHT ) * 2 / 3;
693 const int window_w = FULL_SCREEN_WIDTH + std::max( 0, TERMX - FULL_SCREEN_WIDTH ) / 2;
694 w_items_w = window_w / 2;
695 w_info_w = window_w - w_items_w;
696 list_lines = window_h - 4; // minus for header and footer
697
698 lines_above = list_lines / 2; // lines above the selector
699 lines_below = list_lines / 2 + list_lines % 2; // lines below the selector
700
701 w = catacurses::newwin( window_h, w_items_w,
702 padding );
703 w_item_info = catacurses::newwin( window_h, w_info_w,
704 padding + point( w_items_w, 0 ) );
705
706 ui.position( padding, point( window_w, window_h ) );
707 } );
708 ui.mark_resize();
709
710 bool used_machine = false;
711 input_context ctxt( "VENDING_MACHINE" );
712 ctxt.register_updown();
713 ctxt.register_action( "CONFIRM" );
714 ctxt.register_action( "QUIT" );
715 ctxt.register_action( "HELP_KEYBINDINGS" );
716
717 // Collate identical items.
718 // First, build a map {item::tname} => {item_it, item_it, item_it...}
719 using iterator_t = decltype( std::begin( vend_items ) ); // map_stack::iterator doesn't exist.
720
721 std::map<std::string, std::vector<iterator_t>> item_map;
722 for( auto it = std::begin( vend_items ); it != std::end( vend_items ); ++it ) {
723 // |# {name}|
724 // 123 4
725 item_map[it->tname()].push_back( it );
726 }
727
728 // Next, put pointers to the pairs in the map in a vector to allow indexing.
729 std::vector<std::map<std::string, std::vector<iterator_t>>::value_type *> item_list;
730 item_list.reserve( item_map.size() );
731 for( auto &pair : item_map ) {
732 item_list.emplace_back( &pair );
733 }
734
735 int cur_pos = 0;
736 ui.on_redraw( [&]( const ui_adaptor & ) {
737 const int num_items = item_list.size();
738 const int page_size = std::min( num_items, list_lines );
739
740 werase( w );
741 wborder( w, LINE_XOXO, LINE_XOXO, LINE_OXOX, LINE_OXOX,
742 LINE_OXXO, LINE_OOXX, LINE_XXOO, LINE_XOOX );
743 mvwhline( w, point( 1, first_item_offset - 1 ), LINE_OXOX, w_items_w - 2 );
744 mvwaddch( w, point( 0, first_item_offset - 1 ), LINE_XXXO ); // |-
745 mvwaddch( w, point( w_items_w - 1, first_item_offset - 1 ), LINE_XOXX ); // -|
746
747 trim_and_print( w, point( 2, 1 ), w_items_w - 3, c_light_gray,
748 _( "Money left: %s" ), format_money( money ) );
749
750 // Keep the item selector centered in the page.
751 int page_beg;
752 if( cur_pos < num_items - cur_pos ) {
753 page_beg = std::max( 0, cur_pos - lines_above );
754 } else {
755 int page_end = std::min( num_items, cur_pos + lines_below );
756 page_beg = std::max( 0, page_end - list_lines );
757 }
758
759 for( int line = 0; line < page_size; ++line ) {
760 const int i = page_beg + line;
761 const auto color = ( i == cur_pos ) ? h_light_gray : c_light_gray;
762 const auto &elem = item_list[i];
763 const int count = elem->second.size();
764 const char c = ( count < 10 ) ? ( '0' + count ) : '*';
765 trim_and_print( w, point( 1, first_item_offset + line ), w_items_w - 3, color, "%c %s", c,
766 elem->first.c_str() );
767 }
768
769 draw_scrollbar( w, cur_pos, list_lines, num_items, point( 0, first_item_offset ) );
770 wnoutrefresh( w );
771
772 // Item info
773 auto &cur_items = item_list[static_cast<size_t>( cur_pos )]->second;
774 auto &cur_item = cur_items.back();
775
776 werase( w_item_info );
777 // | {line}|
778 // 12 3
779 fold_and_print( w_item_info, point( 2, 1 ), w_info_w - 3, c_light_gray, cur_item->info( true ) );
780 wborder( w_item_info, LINE_XOXO, LINE_XOXO, LINE_OXOX, LINE_OXOX,
781 LINE_OXXO, LINE_OOXX, LINE_XXOO, LINE_XOOX );
782
783 //+<{name}>+
784 //12 34
785 const std::string name = utf8_truncate( cur_item->display_name(),
786 static_cast<size_t>( w_info_w - 4 ) );
787 mvwprintw( w_item_info, point_east, "<%s>", name );
788 wnoutrefresh( w_item_info );
789 } );
790
791 for( ;; ) {
792 ui_manager::redraw();
793
794 const int num_items = item_list.size();
795
796 // Item info
797 auto &cur_items = item_list[static_cast<size_t>( cur_pos )]->second;
798 auto &cur_item = cur_items.back();
799
800 const std::string &action = ctxt.handle_input();
801 if( action == "DOWN" ) {
802 cur_pos = ( cur_pos + 1 ) % num_items;
803 } else if( action == "UP" ) {
804 cur_pos = ( cur_pos + num_items - 1 ) % num_items;
805 } else if( action == "CONFIRM" ) {
806 const int iprice = cur_item->price( false );
807
808 if( iprice > money ) {
809 popup( _( "You can't afford that item." ) );
810 continue;
811 }
812
813 if( !used_machine ) {
814 used_machine = true;
815 p.moves -= moves_cost;
816 }
817
818 money -= iprice;
819 p.use_charges( itype_cash_card, iprice );
820 p.i_add_or_drop( *cur_item );
821
822 vend_items.erase( cur_item );
823 cur_items.pop_back();
824 if( !cur_items.empty() ) {
825 continue;
826 }
827
828 item_list.erase( std::begin( item_list ) + cur_pos );
829 if( item_list.empty() ) {
830 add_msg( _( "With a beep, the empty vending machine shuts down." ) );
831 return;
832 } else if( cur_pos == num_items - 1 ) {
833 cur_pos--;
834 }
835 } else if( action == "QUIT" ) {
836 break;
837 }
838 }
839}
